name: HERNIA 'Appliances' Cassette
description:
LIMITED TO 100 COPIES
Duration: 60 minutes
Includes full color artwork, insert & COME RECORDS sticker.

HERNIA is Anonymous Bosch & The Brutal Poodle of BRUTAL POODLE.
Recorded live at Naut Flats in Landers, CA USA.

'Chords start to explore song-like forms about ten minutes in accompanied by moanings and shrieks. The heavy metallic clanging from side a finds its way back into side b in a somewhat more melodic form before erupting into static. Pitch-bent and effected recordings of music, spoken dialogue, and children find their way into the performance but their origins are so deeply muddled it's really hard to guess where they came from. Their use picks up heavily in the last ten minutes of the tape along with the first unaffected vocals of the whole recording. It ends with more of the dry acoustic guitar/microphone feedback elements and a minute of moaning the words "rose hip" like a person afflicted with some sort of degenerative mental condition.' - HighBias.org

name: THE ACIDIC JEWS 'Clean Rigs' Cassette
description:
LIMITED TO 100 COPIES
Duration: 60 minutes
Includes full cover artwork, 2 inserts and a COME RECORDS sticker.

THE ACIDIC JEWS are/is/was Emmy (The Volcano) Collins on everything.

'Listening to this is sort of like slowly sliding down a very long, very steep, very twisty slide clogged with cat corpses into a pool of Boiling napalm...this may be 2009's best noise record' - Ray Cummings/Signal to Noise magazine

'Face Melting Noise Collages' - Highbias.org

Voted 2nd best noise recording of 2009 at: houstonpress.com

name: bRUTAL pOODLE 'LuftWaffle'  cassette
description: LIMITED EDITION! Only 100 copies available!!! Cover features female nudity. Duration: 41 minutes bRUTAL pOODLE's 2nd release (only available on cassette!) Includes full color cover art, insert and COME RECORDS sticker. Track Listing: Side A: 'Conceptual Deviance', 'LuftWaffle', 'Oceans of Blank', 'Like a Fresh Shit in an Old Sock', 'Connect the Rots', 'Snowed Out', 'The Rapist Has No Taste' Side B: 'Prizes of Resistance', 'Horn Dogs', 'Conception of the Conniption', 'Eat Your Mistakes'
